name: Kill 3 Dire Wolves
info: Dire Wolves have been ruining all my walks outside town. I will pay to have some of them taken out.

name: Kill 3 Giants
info: Giants are everywhere! They do not like the townsfolk and keep trying to eat them. Will Reward anyone who can eliminate some

name: Kill 3 Demons
info: Demons have been seen lurking just beyond the edge of town. Will pay to get rid of them.

name: Kill 3 Dragons
info: Dragons have been burning our crops and eating our livestock! Slay them and the reward is yours.

name: Find a Superior Health Potion
info: My husband is going off to war soon. I need a Superior Health Potion to make sure he comes back to me.

name: Find 2 Health Potions
info: Trading a Superior Health Potion for 2 regular Health Potions. Come find me at the Tavern when you have them.

name: Kill a Vicious Dire Wolf
info: A Dire Wolf has taken my family from me. I will give you everything I have if you slay the beast.

name: Kill a Demon
info: A Demon has torn our town apart. Kill it and you will be rewarded.
